Dataset guide Joyce Robbins 2020-08-14 Chapter 1 R Packages 1.1 Exploring data in packages: Install datacat: remotes::install("jtr13/datacat") View information with: library(datacat) get_dataset_info("ggplot2") %>% View() 1.2 List of packages with data alr4 library(datacat) get_dataset_info("alr4") %>% dplyr::pull(name) %>% paste(collapse = ", ") ## [1] "BGSall, BGSboys, BGSgirls, BigMac2003, BlowBS, Blowdown, Challeng, Donner, Downer, Forbes, Heights, Highway, Hooker, Htwt, MWwords, MinnLand, MinnWater, Mitchell, Rateprof, Rpdata, Stevens, UBSprices, UN1, UN11, Whitestar, ais, allshoots, baeskel, brains, cakes, cathedral, caution, cloud, domedata, domedata1, drugcost, dwaste, florida, ftcollinssnow, ftcollinstemp, fuel2001, galapagos, galtonpeas, jevons, lakemary, lakes, landrent, lathe1, longshoots, mantel, mile, npdata, oldfaith, physics, physics1, pipeline, prodscore, rat, salary, salarygov, segreg, shocks, shortshoots, sleep1, snake, sniffer, stopping, swan96, turk0, turkey, twins, ufc, ufcdf, ufcgf, ufcwc, walleye, water, wblake, wm1, wm2" MASS get_dataset_info("MASS") %>% dplyr::pull(name) %>% paste(collapse = ", ") [1] “Aids2, Animals, Boston, Cars93, Cushings, DDT, GAGurine, Insurance, Melanoma, OME, Pima.te, Pima.tr, Pima.tr2, Rabbit, Rubber, SP500, Sitka, Sitka89, Skye, Traffic, UScereal, UScrime, VA, abbey, accdeaths, anorexia, bacteria, beav1, beav2, biopsy, birthwt, cabbages, caith, cats, cement, chem, coop, cpus, crabs, deaths, drivers, eagles, epil, farms, fgl, forbes, galaxies, gehan, genotype, geyser, gilgais, hills, housing, immer, leuk, mammals, mcycle, menarche, michelson, minn38, motors, muscle, newcomb, nlschools, npk, npr1, oats, painters, petrol, phones, quine, road, rotifer, ships, shoes, shrimp, shuttle, snails, steam, stormer, survey, synth.te, synth.tr, topo, waders, whiteside, wtloss”
